title: What to do about those kind of Champ Select?
body:
Ranked game...

Leblanc forces Annie to support despite Annie being of higher pick-order
What to do in this situation other than to dodge again and lose 15LP + 30 minute queue time?

Not like it'll be a fun game with those 2 fighting all game.


Sometimes, I wonder why I didn't do this to others in my 3~4 years of playing this game... I mean, they're always in win-win situation where it's either they get their way or the team goes down with them.  (Which they'll get those twisted satisfaction out of it)

Sometimes I really wonder if I should troll and see how fun it is to have others LP at your mercy, and there is absolutely nothing they can do about it.


EDIT: In case you're wondering, yes, I did dodge that, and that's the 3rd straight dodge without playing a ranked since last night. (I definitely have lost about 21LP thus far just from dodging those kind of games)

My patients is running really thin with this game over the years, ~~hopefully I don't have to dodge the next one~~

Actually fuck it, I'm not playing a game today, I'll just go play something offline instead. Maybe some JRPG.

replies.body:
lel:
If you want to win, u will go supp

If you want to get better at the game follow this advice. Dont care about the outcome of the game, care about how you played in the game. You shouldnt care too much about these lobbies, just mute both of them and play to improve.
